page.title: 15An Adult's Day,Gotherington
page.content: Each morning everyone is woken up by the radio followed by the kettle.About ten minutes later Dad goes into the bathroom to wash etc.Fifteen minutes later Dad comes out and gets dressed, says good bye and goes to work.Dad drives in to the Eagle Star car park and then goes upstairs and switches on his flex clock.He then takes a note of jobs to complete and looks at his diary.Then there may be a meeting with project leaders or sometimes with user department whose computer systems Dad looks after.At lunch time Dad gets a partner to play him at squash. When the game is over Dad has his lunch and starts the afternoon which goes by much the same as the morning.At the end of the day Dad goes home, the time he leaves varies.Later he sometimes goes out but often stays in to watch television.
